dessert.name: Classic Cheesecake
dessert.description: A sweet dessert consisting of 5 more layers: a mixture of soft, fresh cheese, eggs, and sugar.with fresh coconut

dessert.name: Sticky toffee pudding
dessert.description: A very moist sponge cake, made with finely chopped dates, covered in a toffee sauce and served with a vanilla custard or vanilla ice-cream.

dessert.name: Mixed berry mousse
dessert.description: Freshly made mousse from 5* chefs with mixed berries including blueberry and blackberry with a hint of lemon and mint

dessert.name: Mango and coconut soufflé
dessert.description: Egg-based dish coated with mango syrup and a sprinkle of fresh coconut

dessert.name: Vegan chocolate cake
dessert.description: Moist chocolate cake slice accompanied with our special custard creme.
